rooms.description: Modern entry with minimalistic design, ensuring a clear flow from the entrance to the main living areas. The design adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance in the north-east direction for positive energy.

An expansive open-plan area combining living space and dining zone, with floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall providing natural light and a connection to the outdoors. The layout encourages social interaction while maintaining an uncluttered aesthetic.

An integrated kitchen that flows seamlessly into the living area, featuring modern fixtures and clean lines in minimalist design, with storage solutions hidden behind sleek cabinetry to maintain a clutter-free look.

A quiet study/library space located adjacent to the living room. It features built-in shelves along one wall, ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, and seating arrangements designed for reading or contemplation, aligned with Vastu recommendations for knowledge and wisdom spaces.

A small dedicated space for laundry, storage, and other household appliances. It is strategically placed near the kitchen to facilitate efficient workflow while adhering to minimalistic design principles.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling glass door providing a seamless transition from indoor to outdoor spaces, enhancing natural lighting and adhering to Vastu's emphasis on auspicious entrances.
Large floor-to-ceiling window in the living area for maximum natural light and ventilation, designed to maintain a minimalist aesthetic with clean lines.
